#  mtCars

## Correlation for Cylnder 4

Correlation between drat and wt


```{r}
#| label: fig-1_drat_wt_cyl_4
#| warning: false

library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)

mtcars %>%
  filter(cyl == 4) %>%
ggplot(aes(drat, wt)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  geom_smooth(method = "loess")
```


## Table

````{r}
cor(mtcars$wt, mtcars$drat)

````

The correlation between wt and drat is: 

table(mtcars$cyl, mtcars$drat)
